pageProduct.name: Swisse Horseradish + Garlic + Vitamin C 60 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Swisse Ultiboost High Strength Horseradish + Garlic + Vitamin C is a premium quality formula to help provide symptomatic relief of sinusitis, hayfever and upper respiratory tract infections. The formula also supports healthy immune function and helps reduce the severity and duration of cold symptoms.

Hayfever: Symptoms of hayfever include runny nose, watery eyes, sneezing and congestion. Horseradish has been traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine to help relieve hayfever symptoms.

Sinusitis: Horseradish and garlic have been traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine to help relieve symptoms of sinusitis and symptoms of the upper respiratory tract such as mucous congestion.

Immune Function: Vitamin C is important for immune system health, helping maintain a healthy immune response.

Cold Symptoms: Vitamin C helps to reduce the duration and severity of common cold symptoms.

Antibacterial: Garlic has been used traditionally throughout history for its antibacterial properties.

Antioxidant Support: Vitamin C provides antioxidant support to help protect against potential free radical damage.

Swisse Ultiboost High Strength Horseradish + Garlic + Vitamin C has been formulated based on scientific and traditional evidence to provide three key ingredients in a convenient dose.

Size: 60

Warnings

Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet. If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional. Adults only. The recommended daily dose of this medicine contains 297mg of sodium.

Ingredients

EACH TABLET CONTAINS:

GARLIC (Allium sativum) extract equiv. fresh bulb 1.1 g

HORSERADISH (Armoracia rusticana) extract fresh root 10 g

VITAMIN C (ascorbic acid from calcium ascorbate dihydrate 242 mg) 200 mg

Directions

Two tablets daily before a meal, or as desired.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25 degrees Celsius in a dry place. Always replace cap. Do not use if tamper evident seal is broken.
